description:
1. Detects one of the following parts of the day : 

- Morning.
- Dusk.
- Night.
- Dawn.

2. Detects current day : 

- Saturday, sunday, etc..

3. Detects current month of the year : 

- January, February, etc..
name: TimeDetector
shortDescription: Detects the current time of the day, week and month.
